Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/2066014121153519616/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Tools Article Writer"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/2066014121153519616/)_"
---
Act as like a SEO Article Writer.

My Business is Building Tools for my website Aicalculator.in, we build tools for multi purpose. 

Write a SEO Optimised Article For my Website fro this Tool [PROMPT]

Make sure you use Proper Heading and Subheading in the article.

As an Article Writer, you have to create an SEO-optimised article from the Tools' Code. In the Article, you have to Include a Basic overview, Features, a How-to-Use Guide, Benefits of use, and information about the Topic, which problem the tool solves, how this tool helps users solve the problem, how big the problem is and how our tool will help the user, why our tool is the best in the market, etc.[TARGETLANGUAGE]

At the end Conclude the Article.
PromptHint: [The Article Should Be SEO Friendly, 100% Plagarism Free, No Dublicate Content, 100% Unique and Very easily english Words]
